data.title: Clays: Really simple sandals. by Clay Reeves — Kickstarter
data.name: Clay Reeves
data.description: Sandals made with a Vibram sole and parachute cord lacing. Tie yours simply or come up with something new. (We did!)

data.title: INKKAS - Colorful Handmade South American Sneakers! by Inkkas — Kickstarter
